name: HeroBillboardDashboard
description: Full-width hero section with centered text content and an interactive Dashboard component below instead of a static image/video.

description.example: Monitor protocol revenue, trading volume, and wallet activity.

structure.href: string - Link destination (optional). External URLs (https://, http://, www.) open in new tab. Internal values (e.g., 'about', 'contact') scroll to #about, #contact sections
structure.props: Partial<ButtonPropsForVariant> - Additional button props like className, textClassName (optional)

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. Border radius is controlled by ThemeProvider's borderRadius (options: 'sharp', 'rounded', 'soft', 'pill'). All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level to maintain consistent styling across the entire site.

stats.note: Exactly 3 stat cards with animated number cycling (values rotate every 3s via TextNumberCount)

sidebarItems.note: Array of sidebar navigation items with icons

listItems.note: Array of list items for the auto-scrolling list section

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.dashboard: {title: string, stats: [DashboardStat, DashboardStat, DashboardStat], logoIcon: LucideIcon, sidebarItems: DashboardSidebarItem[], searchPlaceholder?: string, buttons: ButtonConfig[], chartTitle?: string, chartData?: ChartDataItem[], listItems: DashboardListItem[], listTitle?: string, imageSrc: string, videoSrc?: string, imageAlt?: string, videoAriaLabel?: string, className?: string, containerClassName?: string, sidebarClassName?: string, statClassName?: string, chartClassName?: string, listClassName?: string}

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" defaultTextAnimation="background-highlight" borderRadius="rounded">
  <HeroBillboardDashboard
    title="Real-Time On-Chain Intelligence"
    description="Monitor protocol revenue, trading volume, and wallet activity."
    tag="Live Analytics"
    tagIcon={Activity}
    background={{ variant: 'plain' }}
    buttons={[{ text: 'Start Building', href: '#' }]}
    dashboard={{
      title: 'Analytics',
      logoIcon: Zap,
      sidebarItems: [{ icon: LayoutDashboard, label: 'Dashboard' }],
      buttons: [{ text: 'Export' }],
      stats: [
        { label: 'Revenue', values: ['$1.2M', '$1.5M'] },
        { label: 'Users', values: ['50K', '75K'] },
        { label: 'Growth', values: ['+25%', '+30%'] }
      ],
      chartData: [...],
      listItems: [...],
      imageSrc: '/dashboard.jpg'
    }}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Requires dashboard prop with all nested properties
dont: Do not use without dashboard data
Do not use for simple hero sections without interactive elements
